name: uzred
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wss(cz, cr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wss(cz, cr)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))

|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: An upper integer is a real number. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
